title: Complete Power of Attorney (Form 2848)
description: A tax professional needs to be formally authorized to represent a client before the IRS.

tasks.description: Gather the client's information and the tax professional's information (including CAF number).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary data for the form.

tasks.description: Specify the tax matters and years for which representation is authorized.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly defines the scope of the representation.

tasks.description: Prepare Form 2848, obtain signatures from both the client and the professional, and file it with the IRS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully prepares and files the Power of Attorney.
